decisions.decision: Distribute the UI as native desktop and app instead of website
decisions.speaker: c8
decisions.context: To mitigate security risks of built-in wallet being inside a website where server hacks can affect all clients
decisions.quote: The solution is simple. Distribute the UI as native desktop and app.
